nodes.text: Damind was a type of lightsaber crystal used in the construction of lightsabers used by the Sith. The planet Daminia was the only known source of damind. In its mineral form, the crystal was known as damindium.
When set in a lightsaber's crystal chamber, damind created a wider and longer blade than seen on a standard lightsaber, able to more-easily deflect blaster fire.
